short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly speed up videos on the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Watch videos up to 4x faster! You can improve your productivity by increasing your playback speed for almost any sites with video content.

The HyperTube extension will automagically set the video speed to your preferred value, and you can quickly adjust the speed using a custom keyboard shortcut or by dragging the speed controls slider.
